place_of_publication.publication_title: Illustrations of the Botany ... of the Himalayan Mountains ...

taxon_identification.other_info_on_name: [In honor of Murdan Aly, plant collector and keeper of the herbarium at Saharunpore]

references.reference: Faden, R. B. 1978. Review of the lectotypification of Aneilema R. Br. (Commelinaceae). Taxon 27: 289--298.
Shinners, L. H. 1962. Aneilema (Commelinaceae) in the United States. Sida 1: 100--101.

key_statement.description: Flowers in 1-flowered cymes; cymes solitary or in fascicles; capsules (4--)5--9 mm
Flowers in several-flowered cymes; cymes solitary or thyrses; capsules 2.5--5 mm.
Bracteoles caducous; capsules with 2 seeds per locule; 2 stamens fertile, 4 staminodial
Bracteoles persistent; capsules with 3--7 seeds per locule; 3 stamens fertile, 3 staminodial
